tagline: RoboTamer Facade is a component dependency substitution system to achieve component independentcy via the facade programming pattern.
body:
Facade's main focus is a to be a component dependency substitution system, and will achieve component interdependency via the facade programming pattern.

With Facade you can build a cli or web framework by mixing components from [Pear](http://pear.php.net), [Zend](http://zendframework.com/), [Composer](http://getcomposer.org/) or just standalone classes from [PHPClasses](http://www.phpclasses.org).

Facade also includes a collection of libraries, and recommends tested components to help you get started.
